entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Petawawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:27 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -2.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Garrison Petawawa 2:00 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -2.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 57 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -9.8°C
Wind: N 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning this evening. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
